body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Walter Gonzalez and the customer's name is Tiffany Nelson.  The conversation is about Clean Shirts R Us (a Dry Cleaner ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Walter Gonzalez, and I'm with Clean Shirts R Us, your friendly dry cleaning service.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Walter, nice to meet you. I'm Tiffany Nelson.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Tiffany! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm just frustrated because my last order got mixed up.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm really sorry to hear that. Let’s see how I can help you. Can I please have your phone number to locate your order?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it’s one two three, four five six, seven eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And could you also provide me with your email address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it’s tiffany.nelson at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Tiffany! I’ll work on locating your order and ensure we resolve this issue quickly.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate that, Walter. I just hope it can be fixed soon.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, and I’ll do my best to expedite the process. Thank you for your time, Tiffany. Have a wonderful day!
